'''Onitaka''' is an [[Inazuma]]n pirate who has only been mentioned in various texts found around [[Yashiori Island]].

==Profile==
Onitaka is a leader of a pirate group that was active on Yashiori Island after the war between the [[Shogun's Army]] and the [[Watatsumi Army]] erupted. He was paid by [[Yasumoto]] to bring [[Chouji's Mother]] to [[Sumeru]], where Yasumoto hopes the [[Sumeru Akademiya]] can find a cure for her condition.<ref name="pharmanotes">{{Ref/Item|Pharmacist's Notebook (II)}}</ref> Before leaving, Onitaka tasked his men with taking care of [[Chouji]], who was left alone in [[Higi Village]] following his father's disappearance and his mother's departure.<ref>Interactable: [[Pirate's Diary#Pirate's Diary #1|Pirate's Diary #1]]</ref>

===Personality===
Onitaka has been characterized as someone who is primarily motivated by [[Mora]], but is nonetheless a "righteous soul" who is willing to those in need.<ref name="pharmanotes" />
